title: API Telegram
content:
Discover our Telegram BotFather service now.

With Telegram's BotFather, you can easily and freely create and manage your own Telegram bots. Customize your bots to interact uniquely with your users.

To obtain a BotFather token for Steamboxchat, follow these steps:
1. Open Telegram and search for 'BotFather'.
2. Start a chat with BotFather.
3. Type '/newbot' to create a new bot.
4. Follow the instructions to set up your bot and obtain the API token.

Steamboxchat Support: Starting from $39/month, prepaid for 6 months.

title: Department ID
content: Assign a departments to all conversations started from Telegram. Insert the department ID.
